xdi2.messaging.container.interceptor.impl.security.secrettoken

Class GraphSecretTokenValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • xdi2.messaging.container.interceptor.impl.security.secrettoken.AbstractSecretTokenValidator
      • xdi2.messaging.container.interceptor.impl.security.secrettoken.DigestSecretTokenValidator
        • xdi2.messaging.container.interceptor.impl.security.secrettoken.GraphSecretTokenValidator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SecretTokenValidator

    public class GraphSecretTokenValidator
extends DigestSecretTokenValidator
    A SecretTokenAuthenticator that can authenticate an XDI message using a "secret token graph", which contains sender addresses and secret tokens in digest form.
